Cathedral_City.Cactus to Clouds Trail: The Cactus to Clouds Trail from Palm Springs, California, to San Jacinto Peak is a hiking trail. With a net elevation gain of 10,400 feet (3,200 m), it has one of the greatest elevation increases of any day-hike routes in the United States. It gains it in only 16 miles (26 km), also making it one of the steeper trails of its length in the world.
